website_summaries.verdict: Cute without being cutesy, these shoes are subtle and versatile.
pros: With cute, subtle fabric detailing, these flats can be dressed up or down
Fabric upper with crisscross detailing at vamp
Comes in grey flannel, natural linen, black flannel and black Cozumel
Contrast lining, lightly cushioned fabric footbed
cons: Do not wash in washing machine – spot clean or use a lint roller

customer_reviews.title: the shoe i keep going back to
customer_reviews.text: LOOOOOVE these. I despise having to dress nicely for work. bleh! I bought these shoes 3 years ago and wore as my "dress shoes" regularly. so comfy, look nice, great all around. They finally started to get too worn out to wear anymore so i started shopping for new black flats. Purchased SEVEN different pairs and they all suck in comparison. finally found these on amazon and ordered. oh man i've missed these flats and am so happy to have a new pair. They are a bit snug & uncomfortable the first day or so but once they stretch out a bit they're PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Ember Parr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for picky 13 year old - great for school uniforms, too
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter LOVES these shoes. She wears them until she wears them out. She wears them everyday to school. One pair lasts about 1/2 of the year. She wore them last year, and is wearing them again this year. I expect she will wear them again next year. She is VERY PICKY about her shoes and has wide feet and she is VERY HAPPY with these. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 dogs

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe, comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: shoes looks just like picture. i normally wear an 8, i got these in a 7.5, they fit just right, a bit snug but still comfortable, they stretched out a little after walking in them. They have memory foam on the inside and a nice rubber bottom sole.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaB

customer_reviews.title: Exchanged for smaller size. Smaller one I was still ...
customer_reviews.text: Exchanged for smaller size. Smaller one I was still swimming it. I can't walk in them but I'm out $41. Really bummed. These shoes are sized way too big, length and width wise. I first tried a 9, then an 8 and half. Still huge, particularly in the width. They should've been labeled WIDE.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, probably not good for wet weather
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable! I am a little concerned about wearing them when the ground is wet as I am not sure how they will hold up. They have some personality but still work for a business casual environment. There is not much support, but I would prefer to be in sandals year round so that doesn't bother me much.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: My go-to flats!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flats! Unlike a lot of flats, they don't rub my heels. They are flexible, comfortable, and feel soft on my feet. They look great as well! It feels like I have slippers on but they are actually flats. I have bought these twice now and they will continue to be my go-to flats.
customer_reviews.author: nicoleelaine8

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I already had a gray pair that I purchased from a department store a long time ago and I finally started looking for a replacement. Amazon didn't have it gray, but did have black and sand. I bought noth colors. These shoes are truly comfortable and they are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes for work. I wear them every single day and then buy a new pair when they wear out. They don’t last forever but I get a solid amount of time out of them for the money and for wearing them every day. The most comfortable flats I’ve ever had after you break them in
customer_reviews.author: jnj1358

customer_reviews.title: These are really comfy and feel great. They do fit a little bit long/wider than ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfy and feel great. They do fit a little bit long/wider than I was expecting, but I have long skinny feet so it is hard to find shoes that fit perfect. I would go down a 1/2 size if bought these again.
customer_reviews.author: kittiecr

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I wear them every day for work. Unfortunately after about a year the soles are worn out and the pads on the inside are falling out. I would have liked them to last longer, but I will probably still buy another pair in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D

customer_reviews.title: I just keep buying these.
customer_reviews.text: I love these flats. I have bought this style from Blowfish at least 4 times because I wear them to death. I’ve tried other flats but these are the most comfortable while still being cute.
customer_reviews.author: britanie89

customer_reviews.title: They are poorly made. The inside sole is crumbled ...
customer_reviews.text: They are poorly made. The inside sole is crumbled up at the toes and it bothered me when i put them on. On the back, the part of the heel, the material is not glued or sewed correctly and it rubs agains my skin and peels it off I had to wear a band aid for a few days till my foot healed.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed because they were so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I actually tried on these shoes @TJ MAX in Waltham, MA & they were only $19.99? I tried on size 6 which was too small & size 7 was too big 😏Thought shoes didn't come in half sizes but there some 71/2, 81/2 etc. I was so disappointed because they were so comfortable. So I wrote down Name Brand (Blowfish), went on line to find them on Amazon.com & ordered size 61/2 even though they were $10.00 more @$29.99?? I am so glad that I followed thru & love my new shoes SO SO COMFORTABLE.... I wish they had my size @TJ MAX cuz I would have bought TWO PAIR
customer_reviews.author: Susan Calden

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: I love Blowfish shoes, but these were tight across the top. I've only worn them a few times since getting them, and always regretted it by the end of my workday.
customer_reviews.author: kelley

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 6M, these are too tight in length and too wide in width, such a weird fit so will have to return. Cute style and moderate support, probably good fit for someone with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of these Glowfish Glo Flats. I get a new pair ever year. I like flats and they look good with jeans and my office attire. They could be a little bit more padding in the sole but are very comfortable shoes. I wear a 7 1/2 and I had to get size 8; so they do run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Gamble Girl

customer_reviews.title: Back of shoe is high and stiff.
customer_reviews.text: The back of this show is high and stiff and painful. I have a pair similar to these so I thought they would be the same (other is also Blowfish) but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: S.M. Dishman

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Shoe for Summer
customer_reviews.text: Actually I really do like this pair of shoes. It is just that they are bit hard to keep clean. But they are comfortable; fit nicely. Unlike other shoes, there are no red marks on my feet when I take them off at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but large
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of blowfish flats has seen better days so I ordered this grey pair for the winter. I love the look of it but it definitely fits a little bigger than my last pair. It was a bit of a hassle to return these from the seller, so I'm giving them to my sister. One thing to note...the old blowfish flats did not have a cushioned liner. These have a strange cushioned gel liner and its a little odd if you are used to the old style. I love gel inserts, but this one was a little too squishy for me.
customer_reviews.author: cswoj

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive & exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: These are very casual soft shoes.. I find myself reaching for them a lot because despite no arch support, they are so comfortable. I can wear them all day and am happy with the style as they go with everything. Bought a second pair of Blowfish and like them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa N.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are the most adorable shoes!! I love them. They are just little big, I would advise ordering half a size down. But they are really comfortable and I've had a ton on compliments (and I've only had them two days!!) 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel MF

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for those with wide feet. The material allows your feet to stretch within the shoe. As someone who has had bunion surgery and has trouble with shoes that squeeze my feet, these shoes are great! I love them so much that I have bought three pairs over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but only lasts one season
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these 5 stars if they would have lasted longer. I only got one summer out of these shoes before the bottom wore through. I knew that when I purchased these linen ones though because I had already worn out a black pair. They are very comfortable and I wore them almost everyday to work. I just wish they would last more than one season.
customer_reviews.author: Kris F.

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much I bought a second pair. First ones lasted a year with heavy use
customer_reviews.author: K Carlson

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are comfortable & very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I found a pair of Blowfish flats at Burlington Coat Factory & was on a mission to find another pair. I found these & worn them until they were no longer able to be worn. These shoes are comfortable & very versatile. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: juliemcox0

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, comfortable, and look great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy these shoes online, but the fit is exactly how my wife likes. The design looks great and seems sturdier than most flats.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Smh
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Use em everyday for work so I get 6 months/ maybe more before I heave to replace. I always get the same size but somehow these were a bit bigger than my last ones. The backing came up a bit more and somehow would cut me.
customer_reviews.author: Nonyobusiness

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected. slips slightly, but better than too tight. comfortable wore all day for graduation.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Cute! Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Have these in several colors for leggings. Love the fabric for summer, great fit and look, comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: 1feedback

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Love them but they fit bigger than a regular size. I should have ordered a 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: ShanonRocks

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Time Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I had them before and I just got them again because they are perfect for dressing up or dressing down and are a clean and crisp style. I think the soles were what broke down on me first- but that was after a lot of good ware!
customer_reviews.author: iab

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and they fit comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The item was identical to description. I love the color and they fit comfortable. However, the shoes were too large and wide
customer_reviews.author: abuelita

customer_reviews.title: ... some time and they have held their shape much better than I had expected from a fabric shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ive had a gray pair for some time and they have held their shape much better than I had expected from a fabric shoe. Much better than I expected from a Fabric shoe. I ordered this black pair and they are just as comfortable. The color is deep black. Easy to slip on and off. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I had pair that I had worn out since they are my "go to" slip-on shoe. The go with skirts, pants, shorts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SNelson8

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfortable but way too large to be the right size
customer_reviews.text: I was so hoping for this shoe to fit me as I purchased a beige one somewhere in department store. These shoes are so comfortable but way too large to be the right size. I purchased size 6 and 7 for my sisters however they were both to big for them. Disappointed in the sizes!!!
customer_reviews.author: TanG

customer_reviews.title: Blowfish Shoes - very dissatisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were oddly wide, like extra material on the width. I have these in black and they are not like that. I found these to be defective and the company still made me pay for return shipping. Very unhappy with company.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes - consider sizing down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size down from my normal 8 per other reviews. I did get pinky toe blisters wearing them for a long walk the first day I got them, but I'm pretty confident they'll stretch slightly given the material. I'm still glad that I sized down. I love the soft sole material. No toe cleavage is a plus for me! Nice quick slip on shoes for running around in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hagberg

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair! I love these shoes! They are so very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these little shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these little shoes. They were so light and sweet to pack while traveling. I am tall so I need little flat, inexpensive! dress shoes. I have even put them in the washing machine on gentle and they came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud51297

customer_reviews.title: and they are the most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. I had bought them at a local store two years ago, and they are the most comfortable shoes I own! Since I could not find them anymore locally, I was excited to find them on Amazon so I could order a new pair. They are true to size (I wear an 8), and they are soft and cushy.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Really scratchy and uncomfortable. Feel like they are super low-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan & Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Cute But Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Flattering shape and cute style but cheaply made. These don't offer any real support so if you need supportive shoes these are not for you. The liner came unglued in just a couple months of wear and beneath the cheapo liner is a piece of cardboard, I kid you not. But you get what you pay for I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Comfy flats for all day ise
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flats to wear all day as a teacher.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice casual shoe to throw on with sundress’s or capris. They don’t have much arch support but are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are comfortable but the rubber sole started to split and peel ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable but the rubber sole started to split and peel after one wear. I don't expect these to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: I love the brand Blowfish because they have very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand Blowfish because they have very comfortable shoes. The only reason these shoes didn't receive 5 stars is because they're already starting to look aged after only 2 uses. So maybe catch these shoes when they're on sale to make it more worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Little Miss Random

customer_reviews.title: Blowfish is an Understatement!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Soft and comfortable on post surgery foot. Use it every day to work and leisure. Need to have more colors. I would recommend to every lady and especially to those who had foot surgery like I had. Great use in summer or winter and around the house. Please have more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Laduce800

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect little black flats! Very comfortable, very cute - I get lots of compliments! I have worn them with casual clothes and with dresses and they always look great and feel great. I may or may not have purchased a total of 4 pairs ... they are that good that the idea of never finding them again made me buy a bunch!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn  M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were delivered on time, and packed well received in good condition and as described. I don't only recommend them I plan on buying others in different styles and colors.
customer_reviews.author: TMcD

customer_reviews.title: Great casual but still nice-looking flat
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about these is that they're a little stiff in the heel and rub a little raw. I have an older pair of the same shoes, however, and those never rub my heels at all, so hopefully these break in the same way. Great casual but still nice-looking flat!
customer_reviews.author: aowrya

customer_reviews.title: Comfy flats
customer_reviews.text: I have re-ordered these several times as they are very comfy. Usually flats irritate the back of my foot, but the material of these is so soft, I can wear them all day, anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flats! I’ve owned several pairs and wear them often. Because of that, they wear out pretty fast and need to be replaced. Great product for the price and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chel1528

customer_reviews.title: I like the design...
customer_reviews.text: This shoes is comfy - however, after using it once, it expanded and became big for my feet. Good thing my niece has bigger feet than me - so she is one lucky and happy girl. Order half a size smaller if you are considering to buy this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand - this shoe too. Simple and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Buzo family household

customer_reviews.title: My go-to shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes! I have ordered many times over the years and they never disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The best of Blowfish, but still not great. The soles are sticky and catch on carpet. The bottoms are slick and slide on hardwood and tile. CAUTION.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the shoes fit and look but after 4 or 5 wears they smell BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe! Very quiet shoes too. They do run a big large but I don't have problems keeping them on. This is my fourth pair of Blowfish and 2 of 4 styles run a bit large. I will continue to purchase this brand of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sandpile

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits and wears well. Very comfy and love the looks for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Surlat

customer_reviews.title: ... the second time I bought theses shoes because I love them so much
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought theses shoes because I love them so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Comfy flats
customer_reviews.text: These are such comfortable flats! This is my second pair because I wore my first pair out.
customer_reviews.author: SPJett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes.... For a teacher who's on her feet most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: K Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pairs of these, just wanted more colors because they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Winquist

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy slipons! Size is just right and they will be extremely helpful after ACL surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Order a half-size smaller!
customer_reviews.text: According to the warnings of a few reviewers, I ordered these shoes a half size smaller (US 9) than I normally wear (US 9.5), and I am glad that I did! They fit well! I had to break them in (first time I wore them, I got a blister) but now they wear well, and the soles are very comfortable! A great solution to my long-time search for comfortable flats!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: There is no support and the cloth material absorbs humidity so you wind up putting on wet shoes. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are cute, but really uncomfortable. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute, but really uncomfortable. I tried to put insoles in them to make them more comfy but they hurt even more.
customer_reviews.author: HAHAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple flats
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these shoes a few times now. They're my go to simple flats. I buy insoles for them and can wear them all day comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An 8 fit like a 10
customer_reviews.text: An 8 fit like a 10. And then a 7.5 & 7 fit as they should but I need an 8...great footbed. Cute canvas casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: All my fault
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice and high quality, but a ten was too large, and I usually wear a 9.5, so I think I will exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryaledup

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and match everything
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are quite comfortable and go with everything. Look great with khaki pants or shorts and light-colored skirts and dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Calder

customer_reviews.title: They are great for work for me as they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set that I have purchased in this color. They are great for work for me as they are comfortable, go well with nice capris and meet our dress code of not being allowed to wear an open toe shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! So comfortable! I have ordered several pair in different colors for walking around Paris! Comfort and style = ideal shoes at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I love the blowfish flats
customer_reviews.text: I love the blowfish flats. They are so comfortable. The only issue I have is not many places carry a size 11 which is the size I normally wear. This last time I ordered them I got a 10 hoping I could wear them. They are a little snug but still better than any other shoe I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable We Bought 5 Pairs!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable that I purchased 3 pairs for me and 2 for my mother! All fit perfectly and can easily be worn all day. Though the soft cushiony innersole is fine for my mom, I wear orthotics and pulled out the manufacturer's innersole for my own. Worked great! One negative: the ones that look like leather online don't look like leather when you take them out of the box. I'm not sure whether they are or not. But the cloth ones are fantastic. I hope they continue this line.
customer_reviews.author: Pam In Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the neutral color which goes well just about everything.
customer_reviews.author: ethelyn bellande

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Cute comfey and casual. I want them in every color
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: Hope you like them as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: You have to understand, before you buy these shoes that the fabric stretches. I typically wear a size nine shoe. I purchased this shoe in an eight and it was a little snug when I first started wearing them. After two weeks of breaking them in the are formed perfectly to my foots shape. Hope you like them as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, way too big
customer_reviews.text: I regularly order Blowfish shoes in size 7 and they fit really well. For some reason, this pair is way too large. The shoes are cute, but what good is that. I suggest trying these on first, because I had to pay the shipping to get this refund.
customer_reviews.author: An G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite brand of shoes - they are super paded on the bottom of the foot and SOOOOO comfortable (and cute!!)
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the blowfish brand!! Shoes fit perfect and so very comfortable!! You won’t be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH DEGENNARO

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are actually the second pair I've purchased - I wore the first pair for over a year, loved them, but then I got a new puppy. She got hold of them and had a nice meal! I was so glad to be able to find them again, now if I can just remember to keep them away from the puppy!
customer_reviews.author: keb124

customer_reviews.title: Comfy flats
customer_reviews.text: Universal design and comfortable. Perfect for corporate casual at work. Fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Sgvmom1

customer_reviews.title: These are nice flats that are attractive
customer_reviews.text: These are nice flats that are attractive. They were a little large- I tried a 7.5 when I normally can do an 8 or 7.5 and I still found them a little large.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these shoes. Comfortable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pavelescu

customer_reviews.title: love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes. I have very tender feet and these are so comfy. There is really no arch support but, I just add an insert and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tumanycats

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love Blowfish brand and I am an elderly lady but this pair looks like it would look good on young or old. They are comfortable right off the bat. You do have to be careful and not get them wet since they are cloth shoes but this is my 3rd pair of Blowfish shoes and wish they would come out with more styles in flats.
customer_reviews.author: Debe Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Very cute shoes, look adorable with jeans
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, about as quality you would expect for the price. Cool shoe design, and they look great with jeans for work. The insole is also comfortable. I would buy in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sizing for Blowfish shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of size 7 which fit perfectly and these are 7's and are definitely shorter than the ones I purchased at a store. Disgusted with the Blowfish sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graves

customer_reviews.title: Had to have another pair
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair in black that I bought at DSW. That's what prompted me to buy these from Amazon because I really loved them. They are really comfortable for flats.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great casual work shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, a bit flat but I was able to put my arch inserts comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Julia Szuper

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have several Blowfish shoes so I knew they ran a little wide. However, they don't slip on my heel. Very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my grand daughter. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy. And black, so I can wear them with just about anything. No blisters from these flats!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfortable Flat
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I own. I purchased another pair so I'd have them when my first pair wears out. Perfect for the office or dashing around the stores.
customer_reviews.author: TundraPup

customer_reviews.title: but they are very comfortable. Easy to wear daily to work
customer_reviews.text: Slightly large, but they are very comfortable. Easy to wear daily to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty shoes and they fit as expected. My foot is a little wide and they felt comfortable when I tried them on. I have not worn them yet as I bought them for a holiday party.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Not too expensive and great slip on shoes
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: These were quite comfortable the moment I slipped them on and I walked ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and bunions and I've always found blowfish shoes to work well for me. These were quite comfortable the moment I slipped them on and I walked around all afternoon without any discomfort. I took away one star because they don't seem very durable. They show some wear already after wearing once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes but I had to order a half size smaller for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

product_meta.title: Blowfish Malibu Women's Glo Ballet Flat
product_meta.description:
Ballet

Blowfish.cool shoes for cool girls! A fresh line of young contemporary shoes brought to you by designers who travel the world for inspiration and forward trends to bring happiness and cool looks to your feet. One pair and you'll be hooked. Just give the line a try and see. Not only fun, but comfy too. Thanks for fishing!
